DatabaseName.value: <enter a unique lowercase database name here. Ex: revivedanieldb>

StaticWebAppName.value: <enter a name for your static webapp max length 40>

AzureFunctionAPILocation.value: <select Location to Deploy Azure Function API for Static Web App>

repositoryUrl.value: <Enter the URL of your GitHub repository>

branch.value: <Enter the branch name of your GitHub repository>

appRoot.value: <Enter the path to your static web app root, default is './'>

appBuildDirectory.value: <Enter the path to your static web app build directory, default is 'build'>

backendServerName.value: <Enter the name of your backend app>

hostingPlanName.value: <Enter the name of your hosting plan>

linuxNodeEnvironment.value: <select the name of your Linux Node Environment>

applicationInsightsName.value: <Enter the name of your Application Insights>

workspaceResourceId.value: <Enter the Resource ID of your Log Analytics Workspace>
